title: Mike Wilson: U.S. Equities: How Much Correction is Ahead?
description: On today’s TOTM, Chief Investment Officer Mike Wilson says trade tensions may be rattling markets, but the fundamentals are the real culprit behind the correction. So where are equities headed next?
itunes:title: Mike Wilson: U.S. Equities: How Much Correction is Ahead?
